verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Nineveh <S%H5210><s%>. The book <S%H5612><s%> of the vision <S%H2377><s%> of Nahum <S%H5151><s%> the Elkoshite <S%H512><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a jealous <S%H7072><s%> God <S%H410><s%> and avengeth <S%H5358><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> avengeth <S%H5358><s%> and is full of wrath <S%H1167><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> taketh vengeance <S%H5358><s%> on his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, and he reserveth <S%H5201><s%> wrath for his enemies <S%H341><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and great <S%H1419><s%> in power <S%H3581><s%>, and will by no means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty <S%H3068><s%>: Jehovah hath his way <S%H1870><s%> in the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> and in the storm <S%H8183><s%>, and the clouds <S%H6051><s%> are the dust <S%H80><s%> of his feet <S%H7272><s%>.

He rebuketh <S%H1605><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and maketh it dry <S%H2717><s%>, and drieth up <S%H3001><s%> all the rivers <S%H5104><s%>: Bashan <S%H1316><s%> languisheth <S%H535><s%>, and Carmel <S%H3760><s%>; and the flower <S%H6525><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> languisheth <S%H535><s%>.

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> quake <S%H7493><s%> at him <S%H1389><s%>, and the hills melt <S%H4127><s%>; and the earth <S%H776><s%> is upheaved <S%H5375><s%> at his presence <S%H6440><s%>, yea <S%H8398><s%>, the world, and all that dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>.

Who can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his indignation <S%H2195><s%>? and who can abide <S%H6965><s%> in the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger <S%H639><s%>? his wrath <S%H2534><s%> is poured out <S%H5413><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%>, and the rocks <S%H6697><s%> are broken asunder by him <S%H5422><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>, a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>; and he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> them that take refuge in him <S%H2620><s%>.

But with an over-running <S%H5674><s%> flood <S%H7858><s%> he will make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3617><s%> of her place <S%H4725><s%>, and will pursue <S%H7291><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> into darkness <S%H2822><s%>.

What do ye devise <S%H2803><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? he will make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3617><s%>; affliction <S%H6869><s%> shall not rise up <S%H6965><s%> the second time <S%H6471><s%>.

For entangled <S%H5440><s%> like thorns <S%H5518><s%>, and drunken <S%H5433><s%> as with their drink <S%H5435><s%>, they are consumed <S%H398><s%> utterly <S%H4392><s%> as dry <S%H3002><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%>.
There is one gone forth out <S%H3318><s%> of thee <S%H2803><s%>, that deviseth evil <S%H7451><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that counselleth <S%H3289><s%> wickedness <S%H1100><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Though they be in full strength <S%H8003><s%>, and likewise many <S%H7227><s%>, even so shall they be cut down <S%H1494><s%>, and he shall pass away <S%H5674><s%>. Though I have afflicted <S%H6031><s%> thee <S%H6031><s%>, I will afflict thee no more.
And now will I break <S%H7665><s%> his yoke <S%H4132><s%> from off thee <S%H5423><s%>, and will burst thy bonds <S%H4147><s%> in sunder <S%H5423><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath given commandment <S%H6680><s%> concerning thee <S%H8034><s%>, that no more of thy name be sown <S%H2232><s%>: out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of thy gods <S%H430><s%> will I cut off <S%H3772><s%> the graven image <S%H6459><s%> and the molten image <S%H4541><s%>; I will make <S%H7760><s%> thy grave <S%H6913><s%>; for thou art vile <S%H7043><s%>.

Behold <S%H2022><s%>, upon the mountains the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him that bringeth good tidings <S%H1319><s%>, that publisheth <S%H8085><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>! Keep <S%H2287><s%> thy feasts <S%H2282><s%>, O Judah <S%H3063><s%>, perform <S%H7999><s%> thy vows <S%H5088><s%>; for the wicked <S%H1100><s%> one shall no more <S%H3254><s%> pass through <S%H5674><s%> thee <S%H3772><s%>; he is utterly cut off.
